namedQueries.name: TestGridAllTypes
namedQueries.query: SELECT o.stringVariable, o.booleanVariable, o.intVariable, o.floatCVariable, o.bigDecimalVariable, o.bigIntegerVariable, o.enumType  FROM TestTableToCheckMdm o where o.stringVariable = :stringVariable AND  o.booleanVariable = :booleanVariable AND  o.intVariable = :intVariable AND  o.floatCVariable = :floatCVariable AND  o.bigDecimalVariable = :bigDecimalVariable AND  o.bigIntegerVariable = :bigIntegerVariable AND  o.enumType = :enumType

namedQueries.name: TestGridParamFromSpringrollUser
namedQueries.query: SELECT o.id, o.userId, o.service FROM Job o WHERE o.userId = :loggedInUser
